description: This Council has been asked for its observations on an application submitted to Westminster Council (20/04920/FULL) for: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 30th August 2019 (RN:19/04575/FULL) for the 'External shopfront alterations, installation of plant equipment in rear courtyard and associated works, all in connection with the subdivision of the ground and basement levels of 8/8A for use as two retail units (Class A1)'. Namley, to allow the following amendments (i) width of entrance doors to both retail units are reduced from 1.25m to 1.10m; (ii) the height of the glazed section of the shop fronts are reduced from 3.28m to 3.10m; (iii) natural ventilation grilles included at high level of the West Halkin Street facade of the shop fronts; (iv) single glazing; and (v) minor amendments to the internal layouts
